column2: Focussing the winds of death around him, the Hand of Nagash can unleash a devestating wave of destruction.
The Hand of Nagash was known to terrorize the lands on his mighty chariot, filled with dark magic.
The skeleton on this weapon is known to scream in agony. No sound is produced, yet all close to it feel the its pain and witness its torment.
A gift from Nagash to a loyal servant, the hungering blade will extend the unholy existance of its wielder should he ever be in danger.
To be honest it is mostly executioner. Everyone who stands against Nagash is guilty by default.
Where the Hand of Nagash goes, fear and despair follow.
The Hand of Nagash has always been infamous for their merciless use of chariots and riders.
No land is too remote, no place is truely ever out of reach.
Magic made the Hand what he is now, but in war he prefers cold steel over the might of magic.
Burn the cities of the living so they may join us in death.
In the name of Nagash, all kingdoms must fall. There is no rest, no peace and no mercy.
